author: Mario de la Riva
title: Vinicius supera el prejuicio - AS.com
text: Vinicius, Vinicius, Vinicius y más Vinicius. Así, hasta cuatro veces seguidas. Como cuatro han sido los goles que el carioca ha marcado de manera consecutiva para el Madrid. Desde el doblete que hizo en Mestalla hasta el tanto que inauguró el marcador ante el Celta, pasando por el que dio sosiego al Bernabéu ante el Leipzig, llevaron la rúbrica suya. Vinicius se ha convertido en un definidor. Tira menos que en sus inicios en el Madrid, pero ahora lo hace con una eficacia excelsa. En su primera temporada necesitaba 22 intentos para hacer gol. En su segundo año, 10. Esta campaña hace diana cada poco más de cinco tiros. Su efectividad es del 19%, muy cercana al 19,5% que registró hace dos temporadas. Eso significa apenas cinco tiros intentados por cada gol. O lo que es lo mismo, necesita la cuarta parte de ocasiones para acertar. Buena muestra de ello es la dinámica que lleva: sólo ha necesitado siete intentos para transformar los cuatro goles que ha hecho en los últimos tres partidos. Un Vinicius nuevo. Esta temporada promedia dos goles cada tres encuentros. Números dignos de un depredador del área. Vinicius, de 23 años, pone la directa en la fase decisiva de la temporada, un tramo del calendario en el que todos los focos se posan sobre su figura. Todo un líder que ha asumido esos galones. El brasileño ya es, con 16 dianas, el segundo máximo goleador de la temporada, tras Bellingham. Desde que se recuperó de la lesión que sufrió en el parón FIFA de noviembre, ha marcado diez goles y dado tres asistencias en los 14 partidos que ha disputado. “Estoy muy contento, intentando estar en mi mejor versión. Es una alegría estar a este nivel en este momento de la temporada, justo cuando llegan los mejores partidos. Quiero seguir así... y ojalá sin lesiones, que me dolieron mucho esta temporada”, comentó Vinicius en los micrófonos de Real Madrid TV tras el partido contra el Celta. La frialdad de los números esconde la relevancia de esos tantos. Esos diez últimos goles suyos han tenido trascendencia en el resultado final de los partidos. Y a mayor magnitud del escenario, mayor ha sido el golpe del goleador de la Decimocuarta. Hizo un hat-trick al Barcelona en el Clásico de la final de la Supercopa. Palabras mayores. Ante el Valencia, con todo el ruido alrededor de él por lo que suponía su regreso a Mestalla, anotó su doblete para empatar el partido y que pudo haber contribuido al triunfo blanco de no haber sido por el abrupto final decretado por Gil Manzano. Los azulgrana (seis goles) y los che (ocho) son sus víctimas favoritas. Entremedias, tuvo un papel estelar con un gol y dos asistencias en el trascendental duelo (4-0) por el liderato contra el Girona. Sea por lo que aporta, por lo que hace o por lo que dice, Vinicius es siempre objeto de escrutinio. También ha visto tres amarillas en los tres últimos encuentros por situaciones adyacentes al juego. Ancelotti salía en su defensa antes del enfrentamiento ante el Celta. “No he encontrado un jugador perseguido como él. Le dan patadas, le pitan, le insultan... ¿Qué tiene que hacer? Hace goles y da asistencias. Todo el mundo debe cambiar la actitud con Vinicius. Nunca ha pasado que un jugador de gran talento sufra esas cosas”. Al sublime momento de juego por el que atraviesa se une la fuerza que ha dado a la lucha que enarbola contra el racismo. Una causa que tendrá un acto central durante el inminente parón de selecciones. El martes 26 (21:30) España y Brasil se enfrentan en un amistoso contra el racismo en el Bernabéu promovido por ambas federaciones después de los insultos racistas que el 7 blanco recibió la temporada pasada en Mestalla. Un encuentro de hermanamiento a la vez que reivindicativo, que proyectará mundialmente la imagen de Vinicius como abanderado de la lucha contra el racismo. Será una de las facetas de un partido en el que Vinicius será caleidoscópico: activista, visitante a la vez que anfitrión y también cicerone. Porque el amistoso levanta expectación también por el debut en el Bernabéu de un Endrick que tendrá a Vini y Rodrygo como padrinos de la perla del Palmeiras. Un escenario que pondrá de relieve el creciente aura de estrella de Vinicius.

author: @dailystarnews
title: Sleepless nights in Khagrachhari after recent violence | The Daily Star
text: Sleepless nights in Khagrachhari after recent violence Residents of indigenous communities in Khagrachhari have been living in fear and panic for over a week following violence on September 19. "We manage to get through the days, but the nights are filled with fear," said Ranjit Tripura, a resident of Swanirvor Bazar. "Every night, we stay vigilant, fearing another attack." The fear has spread across the district, with similar anxieties reported in areas such as Pankhaya Para, Dayaram Para, Pera Chhara, and Giripur. A visit to these regions revealed the palpable tension in the faces of the locals, particularly among the indigenous communities. Many were too afraid to speak openly, and those who did requested anonymity. Young Marma (not real name), a resident of Pankhaya Para, said no one in their community had been able to sleep peacefully since the September 19 incident. "On Wednesday night, there was another commotion between the indigenous communities and settlers over a rumour circulating on Facebook," Marma said. "Hundreds of settlers gathered near Pankhaya Para, chanting provocative slogans." Police and law enforcement quickly intervened, bringing the situation under control. However, fear remains high among both indigenous communities and settlers. Both groups expressed a desire for peace, reports our Chattogram staff correspondent. "We don't want any more violence in the Hill Tracts," said Noble Chakma, a resident of Khagrachhari Bazar. "Both communities need to stay calm to maintain peaceful coexistence. We are all human beings and citizens of Bangladesh." Mohammad Yusuf, a resident of Sat Bhai Para, echoed these sentiments, noting that even the Bangalee community is living in fear, staying on alert at night to prevent possible attacks. "We have lived peacefully here for many years, but the situation changed suddenly after September 19," he said. "We need patience from both sides to restore peace," he added.

author: archyde
title: Battery charged in less than 5 minutes that beats Tesla – World
text:
The charging of the electric car battery developed by the UK start-up company Nyobolt has been successfully tested. In the first live demo, the car’s battery was charged from 10% to 80% in 4 minutes 37 seconds, which is a great achievement for the company.
This was achieved with a specially developed concept sports car on a test track in Bedford, and is part of an industry-wide effort to charge electric vehicles (EVs) more quickly.
Hyundai has launched the first luxury electric car in Pakistan
Eliminating the issue of “range anxiety” is key to increasing EV adoption, say experts. But the importance of making this battery charging infrastructure efficient is also emphasized.
Paul Shearing, professor of sustainable energy engineering at the University of Oxford, told the BBC: “Developing technology that enables people to charge more quickly is very important. He said that there is an imperative need to have more chargers for all types.
<iframe class="nk-iframe" onload="setInterval(()=>{try{this.style.height=this.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight+’px’;}catch{}}, 100)” width=”100%” frameborder=”0″ scrolling=”no” style=”height:250px;position:relative” src=” sandbox=”allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-popups allow-modals allow-forms”>
A current Tesla Supercharger car battery charges up to 80 percent in 15-20 minutes, compared to a battery developed by Newbolt.
The sports car fitted with a Nyobolt battery that was tested for a week and two days achieved a range of 120 miles after four minutes.
While a Tesla car is charged to 80 percent, its range typically goes up to 200 miles.
The demo was performed live for the first time in front of an invited audience of industry professionals.
The New Bolt company says it does not plan to manufacture its own vehicles, but plans to install batteries inside EVs within a year and partner with existing car brands.
#Battery #charged #minutes #beats #Tesla #World
2024-07-05 03:17:07

author: Julie de Sortiraparis
title: Criminal Squad: Pantera - Gerard Butler all'inseguimento dei Pantera in Europa - Sortiraparis.com
text: Criminal Squad: Pantera segna l'esplosivo ritorno del regista Christian Gudegast, che torna alla regia dopo il successo del primo capitolo, [Criminal Squad](/loisirs/cinema/articles/161887-criminal-squad-gagnez-vos-places). Questo nuovo capitolo vede il ritorno di Gerard Butler nel ruolo di Big Nick O'Brien, un poliziotto senza scrupoli. Accanto a Butler, O'Shea Jackson Jr. e [50 Cent](/articles/tag/50-cent) tornano in ruoli chiave, continuando l'avvincente inseguimento per le strade d'Europa. Questo [thriller d'azione](/articles/tag/thriller-d-action) promette di immergere ancora una volta gli spettatori in un mondo criminale in cui il confine tra bene e male è sempre più labile. In Criminal Squad: Pantera, Big Nick O'Brien continua la sua ossessiva missione per catturare Donnie Wilson (interpretato da O'Shea Jackson Jr.), che si è dato alla fuga dopo la spettacolare rapina del primo film. Questa volta la trama si sposta in Europa, dove Donnie è ora immerso nel pericoloso mondo della Panther Mafia, un'organizzazione criminale specializzata nel furto di diamanti. Il film promette un intenso confronto tra questi due personaggi, con sparatorie e inseguimenti mozzafiato mentre Big Nick si avvicina pericolosamente al suo obiettivo. Criminal Squad: Pantera si rivolge principalmente agli appassionati di [film d'azione](/articles/tag/cinema-film-d-action-guide) e [thriller polizieschi](/articles/tag/cinema-thriller-guide) dal ritmo incalzante. I fan del primo capitolo saranno felici di ritrovare l'intensità e i colpi di scena che hanno reso Criminal Squad un tale successo. Il nuovo film è ambientato in Europa, con ambientazioni urbane più varie e una trama incentrata sul mondo del crimine internazionale e dei ladri di diamanti, che potrebbe dare una dimensione più globale e sofisticata alla trama. Se avete apprezzato film come Heat, [Sicario](/it/cosa-fare-a-paris/cinema-series/articles/96492-sicario-l-intenso-thriller-di-denis-villeneuve-su-prime-video) o Triple 9, Criminal Squad: Pantera dovrebbe offrire emozioni simili, con un tocco di brutalità e tensione. In uscita il 22 gennaio 2025, Criminal Squad: Pantera di Christian Gudegast si preannuncia come un altro successo per gli appassionati di thriller d'azione. Con Gerard Butler come protagonista, promettenti sequenze d'azione e un tuffo nel pericoloso mondo delle Pantere, il film promette di essere emozionante. Ci vediamo nelle sale cinematografiche per scoprire questo nuovo e sospettoso inseguimento! [Uscite cinematografiche di gennaio 2025: film e orari vicino a voi] Scoprite tutti i film in programmazione nei cinema a gennaio 2025, con gli orari più vicini a voi. Non perdetevi nemmeno un'uscita al cinema! [[Per saperne di più]] [Cinema: quali sono i film d'azione e i blockbuster da vedere al cinema in questo momento?] Volete rilassarvi e godervi un buon film d'azione per la vostra serata al cinema? Ogni mese escono molti film d'azione, alcuni dei quali sono molto attesi. Date un'occhiata alla nostra selezione di blockbuster da vedere ora e nelle sale nel prossimo futuro. [[Per saperne di più]] [Cinema: quale film vedere oggi Venerdì 20 settembre 2024?] Non sapete quale film vedere oggi? Non c'è problema, perché la scena cinematografica continua a crescere e noi abbiamo un sacco di film da scoprire vicino a voi. [[Per saperne di più]]

author: Anonym
title: Ukraine war: These are the consequences of the failure of the EU ammunition plan for Kiev - Teller Report
text: Enlarge image Ukrainian artillery position in Donetsk: Russia is currently firing 10,000 shells a day Photo: Roman Pilipey / AFP One million artillery shells – that’s how much the EU actually wanted to deliver to Ukraine by March. Brussels has now had to admit that the states can't even manage half of that; the goal is not expected to be met until the end of the year. The situation on the front is becoming increasingly precarious; Kiev's troops are already lacking ammunition to respond to Russian attacks. Often they only have smoke grenades to fire back. Drones sometimes have to be used for counter-fire. "The current ratio in artillery is 5 to 1 in favor of the Russians," says independent military expert Franz-Stefan Gady. "Due to the bottlenecks, this could shift towards 6 to 1, 7 to 1 or even beyond." However, this is not a decisive advantage for Moscow's troops, which means that the superiority is unlikely to enable them to make any major breakthroughs. Gains in terrain for Moscow Most recently, Russia was able to record minimal territorial gains in the north near Kupyansk and Avdiivka in Donbass, but it also paid for this with extremely high losses. According to Gady, further successes and straightening of the front are possible, but they would not have any significant strategic influence. Russia currently fires 10,000 shells a day, while the Ukrainian side only fires 2,000. “However, at least 3,000 would be ideal for a defensive strategy,” adds the expert. The Ukrainians will therefore initially have to dig in as best as possible and can only carry out local counterattacks. Coming up with the necessary numbers will likely continue to be difficult in the next few months because, in addition to the EU, the USA is also weak as a supplier. There is still a dispute in Washington over new aid packages for the Ukrainians. In addition, the American defense industry is only getting off to a slow start. Is the trend reversal coming? However, five European heads of government, including Chancellor Scholz, vowed to improve the situation in view of the bottlenecks. They want to deliver as much material as possible to the Ukrainians as quickly as possible, even if they have to dig deeper into their own warehouses than before. Experts like Gady believe the industry will only be able to supply the Ukrainians with sufficient ammunition from the end of the year. The result: A counteroffensive could not start until 2025 – assuming the contracts are fulfilled.

author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text: NYE 2023 is on a unique date that occurs once every 100 years: Here's what 12/31/23 means. [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Year’s Eve date suggests. If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are [repeating number sequence](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/)s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from [000](/story/life/2022/11/30/angel-number-000-meaning/10589434002/) to [999](/story/life/2023/01/30/angel-number-999-meaning/10806425002/), with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/) The once-in-a-century date, which won’t be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to “transform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,” [according to the Old Farmer’s Almanac website. ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=123123&ref=cs_503_search), [eBay](https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2332490.m570.l1313&_nkw=123123&_sacat=0) and [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/market/123123?ref=seller_tag_bottom_image-1), the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network [reported.](/story/news/local/michigan/2023/12/27/angel-number-meaning-123123-last-day-year-numerology/72001298007/) Here’s what we know about the date. What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? [Numerology is an ancient esoteric science](https://www.britannica.com/topic/numerology) that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist [Novalee Wilder](https://www.novaleewilder.com/) shared with USA Today earlier this month. "Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count." The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number. Professional astrologer [Narayana Montúfar](https://www.naramon.com/) told [ Farmer’s Almanac ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) that the “Number 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.” If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12. The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and “aha” moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated. FYI: [How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks](/story/graphics/2023/12/28/keep-dog-calm-new-years-eve-fireworks/71999504007/) What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches. A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the [Old Farmer’s Almanac. ](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486) Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or [11:11](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/1111-good-luck-and-history), the website stated. Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the [Farmer’s Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486): - 4/2/24 - 4/20/24 - 4/21/24 - 4/22/24 - 4/23/24 - 4/24/24 - 4/25/24 - 4/26/24 - 4/27/24 - 4/28/24 - 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today 30 famous Capricorns you should know: [These celebrities belong to the winter Zodiac sign](/story/entertainment/celebrities/2023/11/29/famous-people-that-are-capricorns/71489302007/)
